headline: How Cloudflare implemented hardware keys with FIDO2 and Zero Trust to prevent phishing
keywords: Birthday Week, Security, Zero Trust, Cloudflare Zero Trust
description: Adopting a phishing resistant second factor, like a YubiKey with FIDO2, is the number one way to prevent phishing attacks. Cloudflare has used phishing resistant second factors only since February 2021, and these were the steps we took to accomplish that.
